addons/arcview_info_label: To enable Arc you need to {{registerLinkStart}}register{{registerLinkEnd}}. Then you need to add a website. Then you need to copy {{scriptLinkStart}}arc-sw.js{{scriptLinkEnd}} to your root website. Then you need scroll down to {{addwidgetCodeStart}}Add Arc's widget to your site{{addwidgetCodeEnd}} and copy the URL (not the whole thing). The last thing is to add the URL in the input below.
addons/widgetbotchannelid_info_label: To get the Channel ID, go to Discord Server > RMB on the Channel > Copy ID. {{moreinfoLinkStart}}Read more »{{moreinfoLinkEnd}}.
addons/widgetbotserverid_info_label: To get the Server ID, go to Discord Server > Server Settings > Widget > Server ID > Copy. {{moreinfoLinkStart}}Read more »{{moreinfoLinkEnd}}.
addons/widgetbotview_info_label: When enabled it must be configured. It is a widget where you can chat on the website to Discord. Make sure to invite {{widgetbotLinkStart}}the bot{{widgetbotLinkEnd}}.
connections/discordid_info_label: To get the Server ID, go to Discord Server > Server Settings > Widget > Server ID > Copy. {{moreinfoLinkStart}}Read more »{{moreinfoLinkEnd}}.
connections/discordview_info_label: This in navbar on the left. To get it to work, you have to enable Server Widget in Discord Server > Server Settings > Widget. Don't forget to make an Invite Channel.
connections/minecraftstyle_info_label: Simple is without MOTD. Advanced is with MOTD.
embed/embedicon_info_label: Enter a valid link to an image ending with {{typeCodeStart}}.png{{typeCodeEnd}}, {{typeCodeStart}}.jpeg{{typeCodeEnd}}, {{typeCodeStart}}.gif{{typeCodeEnd}}.
embed/embedkeywords_info_label: Search engines make use of keywords to help determine what to show for searches made by users. Seperate with {{keywordsCodeStart}},{{keywordsCodeEnd}} e.g {{keywordsCodeStart}}mc, server, website{{keywordsCodeEnd}} & etc.
embed/embedtitle_info_label: You can put {{everyCodeStart}}$every{{everyCodeEnd}} for having multiple titles on different pages.
navbar/navbarlogo_info_label: This is a logo in the middle of navbar.
navbar/navbarexclude_info_label: Exclude specified links seperated with {{slashCodeStart}}/{{slashCodeEnd}} from the navigation bar.
navbar/navbarstyle_info_label: Elegant style has links at the top. Dynamic style has links below the banner.
options/customcss_info_label: Here you can paste your CSS.
options/customjs_info_label: Here you can paste your JS.
options/note_review: If you like the theme, we would appreciate getting a review {{reviewLinkStart}}here{{reviewLinkEnd}}.
preloader/preloaderview_info_label: If enabled, a loading screen will show when loading the website.
widgets/note_widgets: We don't provide widgets anymore. But we created a new module called {{downloadLinkStart}}WidgetPack{{downloadLinkEnd}}.
updates/up_to_date: Your Nexus is up to date!
